text:
Jennifer Lopez and Marc Anthony may no longer be married, but their 8-year-old twins Emme and Max sure are taking after both of their parents

These apples don’t fall far from the tree!

Jennifer Lopez and Marc Anthony may no longer be married, but their 8-year-old twins Emme and Max sure are taking after both of their parents.

Get push notifications with news, features and more.

The kids were featured on Lopez’s Instagram on Friday, looking just like their mom and dad!

Emme wore a black fur jacket with black leather leggings and gold-toed black boots. Her brunette locks pulled back in a tight ponytail — she served fierce JLo diva-face while sitting on a white couch.

Her brother, Max, was by her side — look posing with double peace signs while wearing a crisp black shirt and grey jeans patterned with black skulls and crossbones.

jennifer-lopez-marc-anthony

“They wanted to come support mama on her first show back in Vegas!!” Lopez captioned the shot — adding the hashtags “#weinthistogether,” “#mylilcoconuts,” and “#styleon1000.”

Their style surely was on 1,000 — as in, “a thousand percent from mom and dad’s closet.”

Lopez and Anthony tied the knot in a secret ceremony in June 2004 at Lopez’s home in Beverly Hills. They dated for just six months before getting married — though first met as friends in 1998 when Anthony was starring in Broadway’s The Capeman.

The couple split in in July 2011, after seven years of marriage, but have remained close since their divorce was finalized in June 2014. They shared the stage in New York City in August, and even shared a kiss after Lopez presented Anthony the Latin Recording Academy’s Person of the Year award at November’s Latin Grammys.

RELATED VIDEO: Watch Jennifer Lopez Tear Up Remembering Her Twins Being Born

A major musical inspiration for Lopez continues to be her twins. As she told PEOPLE Editor-in-Chief Jess Cagle, her 2011 hit single “On the Floor” was motivated by her two children.
title: Jennifer Lopez and Marc Anthony's Twins Dress Like Their Parents
